name: NetroHome
0:
”Alexa, ask Netro Home to water zone one for 5 minutes.”
”Alexa, ask Netro Home to water all zones for 5 minutes.”
”Alexa, ask Netro Home to stop watering.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: netro home
des:
The Netro Smart Watering System is designed for effortless use in residential irrigation. And now, you can simply ask Alexa to start and stop watering your garden. Link your Netro account to your Amazon Alexa app. After connecting Alexa to your Netro device, just say commands like:
"Alexa, ask Netro Home to water zone one for 5 minutes. "
"Alexa, ask Netro Home to water all zones for 5 minutes."
"Alexa, ask Netro Home to stop watering."
